install.name: foobla TO-DO list
install.author: The foobla Team
install.description:
foobla TODO for Joomla Backend.

Based on HP ToDo list from Hannes Papenberg.

This module implements a ToDo list into the tabs in the admin area.

PAY ATTENTION!!!

To use this module properly, please do the following steps.

  • Publish the module by setting the Enabled option to Yes.
  • Select cpanel position for the module.

To configure the module right now, please click here.

For more help, please go to the foobla official site http://foobla.com.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: ordernumber
param.label: Show order number
param.description: If set to Yes, order number of the entries will be showed.

param.name: superadmin
param.label: SuperAdmin edit
param.description: If set to Yes, any SuperAdmin can add the entries

param.name: showothers
param.label: Show other users entries
param.description: If set to Yes, any SuperAdmin can access to the entries of other users.

param.name: prioritize
param.label: Use Priority
param.description: If set to Yes, you can give each entry a priority.

param.name: use_status
param.label: Use Status
param.description: If set to Yes, you can choose the status for each entry.
